cake1.description: We decided to throw a party for Felix, in honor of him being a big brother.  He was thrilled with the idea.  Here, he helps Lucie bake his cake.
cake1.title: Cake 1

cake2.description: He spent quite a while licking the bowls clean.
cake2.title: Cake 2

party_1.description: At the actual party, Felix was a gracious host and a witty conversationalist.  Here he discusses hair care techinques with Julie.
party_1.title: Party 1

party_2.description: Amanda gets a shot of Terry having a shot at Milo.
party_2.title: Party 2

party_4.description: Felix was ecstatic to see Evan.
party_4.title: Party 4

party_6.description: Felix insisted that Evan sit with him, and they both blew as hard as they could.  Evan nearly melted his eyebrows.
party_6.title: Party 6

party_7.description: One of Felix's presents makes him dream of a real ice cream truck.
party_7.title: Party 7

zoo1.description: Sunday.  Nana, Dean and Felix went to Six Flags Marine World USA in Vallejo.   It took a while of searching between the roller coasters and the gift shops to find the actual animals.
zoo1.title: Zoo 1

zoo2.description: The lorikeets rocked.  They mob anyone holding lorikeet food.
zoo2.title: Zoo 2

zoo3.description: Nana attracts lorikeets in her own special way.
zoo3.title: Zoo 3

zoo4.description: Dean and Felix check out the wall o' walrus.
zoo4.title: Zoo 4

zoo5.description: Since before he understood words, we've been telling Felix a bedtime story that we made up,  about sleeping in the caboose of the Old Number Nine Sleepytime Train.  Lately he's been requesting it by name, and embellishing it with extra details.  So of course when the amusement park's train had a ride-in caboose, he insisted that the ticket lady put him in it.
zoo5.title: Zoo 5

zzz.description: Oh no!  This update was about to end without any pictures of Milo!
zzz.title: Zzz

description:
Milo turned a week old and things continue to be smooth. However, Nana left tonight and Dean returns to work tomorrow. Will we be buried under a mountain of poopy onesies by Tuesday? Stay tuned.

Saturday we threw a Big Brother party for Felix. It was a big success: all his favorite people came, and he was proud to be the center of attention.
title: August 1
